mainText:
Steve Jobs was an extraordinary leader, he had vision, unlimited passion,
and a persistence that was unmatched. He took a company that was dying with
stocks below $10.00 and grew it with products that were revolutionary in
customer experience and features to a stock of $400.00+. Who does
that? He will be missed and he deserves his place in history as a visionary
that never accepted - it cannot be done - and made it happen.
header: A Giant in the IT World
author: John
